topics.body:
the brain is such a piece of shit.

"oh you want to sleep now? but im not tired yet, how about 2 more hours awake"

"oh you needed to wake up at 7 AM? well off by 3 hours i guess"

"you wanted to sleep to kill time? welp you only slept for 2 mins only".

"what do you mean you are studying? i want to go to sleep"
